m-38tZMlu2aJysjyP.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
m-38tZMlu2aJysjyP.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

mDcNBgjRry_Y7Rsqt.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

features.situation: to skill rolls any time you take an unnecessary risk (in the GM’s opinion)
from others in social situations when you have a chance to plan your attire in advance
to someone else's reaction bonus from others when you put together their outfit
in penalties may be ignored when due to close quarters
in penalties may be ignored when due to close quarters

tt-y7hiSmdEfu5pIB.name: Luck
tt-y7hiSmdEfu5pIB.notes: Usable once per hour of play

features.situation: from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.
on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill and all Engineer rolls for new inventions
from others who can hear your voice

tvmVxcl4mEJqojIC-.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
tvmVxcl4mEJqojIC-.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

mwD2T1m_JMRAwW0C1.name: Effects: Highly Addictive (-5 on withdrawal roll)

mvZvqvDHioUhJYtgi.name: Effects: Totally Addictive (-10 on withdrawal roll)

tbGIS0SETvXH0-ECN.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
tbGIS0SETvXH0-ECN.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

tqJnqNqBENTEWxYZl.name: Aichmophobia/TL5- (Sharp Things)
tqJnqNqBENTEWxYZl.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

tnTqX0DPgSJ0EwUnd.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
tnTqX0DPgSJ0EwUnd.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

t1SMZjV9Ema1lBnDw.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
t1SMZjV9Ema1lBnDw.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

tBPbqEkAcYvQ8bAo4.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
tBPbqEkAcYvQ8bAo4.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

ttB57U6r0eW7h1jM0.name: Bloodlust
ttB57U6r0eW7h1jM0.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you need to accept a surrender, evade a sentry, take a prisoner, etc.

tnopi6TuL1MKFmvZZ.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
tnopi6TuL1MKFmvZZ.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

features.situation: from others
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

t7OB3-R5Eexq6D-g6.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
t7OB3-R5Eexq6D-g6.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

tJQdh7KrDrvetdxQF.name: Code of Honor (Pirate's)
tJQdh7KrDrvetdxQF.notes: Always avenge an insult, regardless of the danger; your buddy’s foe is your own; never attack a fellow crewman or buddy except in a fair, open duel.

t0xXRBwit3Ah7Ud6c.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
t0xXRBwit3Ah7Ud6c.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

features.situation: from like-minded extroverts
or worse from sober-minded citizens (GM discretion)
from pious folk

tFhNtmUN1q7MQxrML.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
tFhNtmUN1q7MQxrML.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

tmFHDawevQxylloTn.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
tmFHDawevQxylloTn.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

tOMkavgXBlk1ij8yb.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
tOMkavgXBlk1ij8yb.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

tBJ_8HozOCmU6hBqC.name: Gluttony
tBJ_8HozOCmU6hBqC.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

tZ_nAfxrhLuRaun4I.name: Greed
tZ_nAfxrhLuRaun4I.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

tAjkhydf1FwpnG62T.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
tAjkhydf1FwpnG62T.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

tD_x4-Y7TAVVnS_ZD.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
tD_x4-Y7TAVVnS_ZD.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

te_pqQ4AYmHkhIUd7.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
te_pqQ4AYmHkhIUd7.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

t_REo2GUz3rpqHlh-.name: Impulsiveness
t_REo2GUz3rpqHlh-.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

t7bB8j-b6n9dMXkL5.name: Incurious
t7bB8j-b6n9dMXkL5.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: to new things
from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

t0ylKtzBS4bjEYLmK.name: Kleptomania
t0ylKtzBS4bjEYLmK.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you are presented with a chance to steal, at up to -3 if the item is especially interesting to you (not necessarily valuable, unless you are poor or have Greed). If you fail, you must try to steal it. You may keep or sell stolen items, but you may not return or discard them.

tTZYk8U8IPQmjlNiw.name: Laziness
tTZYk8U8IPQmjlNiw.notes: Your chances of getting a raise or promotion in any job are halved. If you are self-employed, halve your monthly pay.

t0R5s27bU93ajJgEL.name: Lecherousness
t0R5s27bU93ajJgEL.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.

td7E2zcL7C4pilQnj.name: Light Sleeper
td7E2zcL7C4pilQnj.notes: Whenever you must sleep in an uncomfortable place, or whenever there is more than the slightest noise, you must make a HT roll in order to fall asleep. On a failure, you can try again after one hour, but you will suffer all the usual effects of one hour of missed sleep.

t2t3dgInDOxWnqkXJ.name: Loner
t2t3dgInDOxWnqkXJ.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

tfVRuQ1s680V8YeL2.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
tfVRuQ1s680V8YeL2.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

tg0SYoel882eC2iKr.name: Mild Shyness
tg0SYoel882eC2iKr.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

tOd-l-hlw2wGnVQLX.name: Miserliness
tOd-l-hlw2wGnVQLX.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

tGfPtJQw5kxqiNSNS.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
tGfPtJQw5kxqiNSNS.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

tKJ8_GDBFRVwSazZT.name: Necrophobia (Death)
tKJ8_GDBFRVwSazZT.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

tx2joYT3fFXLpBdYs.name: Overconfidence
tx2joYT3fFXLpBdYs.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs
from others
toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled

tZRycrD9ByOgPanl2.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
tZRycrD9ByOgPanl2.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

mR-UG9k8nvE5SiKnO.name: People Affected
mR-UG9k8nvE5SiKnO.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

tLMcaae8-3cpTCHcp.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
tLMcaae8-3cpTCHcp.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

tpItmZGcxmyzjlesJ.name: Selfish
tpItmZGcxmyzjlesJ.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

tWgdyX5Vi2eqodvBu.name: Severe Shyness
tWgdyX5Vi2eqodvBu.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

features.situation: on all self-control rolls one hour after you awaken from any sleep longer than a one-hour nap
to IQ and IQ-based skills one hour after you awaken from any sleep longer than a one-hour nap
additional penalty whenever the GM assesses attribute penalties for missed sleep
from non-criminals who learn of your Criminal Record. Police, judges, vigilantes, and other law-and-order types react at -2
from others

txIF5eHDxdvMNmn5m.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
txIF5eHDxdvMNmn5m.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

tcnEameiElvbGqtpF.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
tcnEameiElvbGqtpF.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

tPUILXkntQCiXmlb-.name: Trickster
tPUILXkntQCiXmlb-.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

tgVRwmHMBNkSQdEID.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
tgVRwmHMBNkSQdEID.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

tfopCNEEM_zSl2lhV.name: Unfit
tfopCNEEM_zSl2lhV.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

t_wAaIFYe00Olzg_t.name: Unluckiness
t_wAaIFYe00Olzg_t.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

tRFhaQg1o6XllYt75.name: Very Unfit
tRFhaQg1o6XllYt75.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

tWE_5hEqKAmVmEIX6.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
tWE_5hEqKAmVmEIX6.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

stfH6yzQBWcFMDjvn.name: Area Knowledge
stfH6yzQBWcFMDjvn.notes: Location of its major cities and important sites; awareness of its major customs, ethnic groups, and languages (but not necessarily expertise); names of folk of Status 7+; and a general understanding of the economic and political situation

SGZJzBh8TMJUymnJ2.name: Spend 4 extra points in primary or secondary skills

sIh7_nXKxazl1J-Ug.name: Area Knowledge
sIh7_nXKxazl1J-Ug.notes: Location of its major cities and important sites; awareness of its major customs, ethnic groups, and languages (but not necessarily expertise); names of folk of Status 7+; and a general understanding of the economic and political situation
